original_text: When you are meeting together as believers, maybe two men will come to join with you. One of them is wearing beautiful clothes, and he has gold rings on his hands. The other man is poor, and he is wearing old clothes that are dirty.
korean_text: 만일 너희 회당에 금 가락지를 끼고 아름다운 옷을 입은 사람이 들어오고 또 남루한 옷을 입은 가난한 사람이 들어올 때에

sentences.original_text: When you are meeting together as believers
maybe two men will come to join with you
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 두 사람이 당신과 함께하기 위해 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: One of them is wearing beautiful clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그 중 한 사람은 아름다운 옷을 입고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and he has gold rings on his hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 손에 금반지를 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and he is wearing old clothes that are dirty
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 더러운 낡은 옷을 입고 있습니다
